__comment_1: JSON does not allow // comments; __comment_* fields are informational.
__comment_embed_dim: For text-embedding-3-large, default output dimension is 3072. You can set embed_dim lower (for example 384) to reduce cost/latency. Keep embed_dim consistent between ingest and benchmark.
__comment_api_key: Preferred: set OPENAI_API_KEY in your environment. Alternative: set openai_api_key below.
__comment_retrieval_mode: dense = ANN only. hybrid_rrf = ANN + lexical BM25-style fusion (recommended for quality).
__comment_candidate_k: Retrieve a larger candidate pool, then optionally rerank down to top_k.
__comment_llm_model: Set to ChatGPT 5.2 model name. Uses the same OpenAI API key as embeddings.
